inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed carcinoma of the uterine cervix
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: metastatic lymphadenopathies (any of pelvis or PAN >1.5 cm in short diameter)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of 0, 1, 2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: adequate bone marrow function: absolute neutrophil count (ANC) greater than or equal to 1,500/mcl
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: adequate renal function: creatinine equal to or less than 2.0 mg%
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: signed an approved informed consent and authorization
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: recurrent LN(s) which was(were) previously irradiated
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: diagnosis of other malignance tumors except papillary or follicular thyroid cancer or skin cancer
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and previous radiation to the neck, which may trigger exclusion criteria.
